Cape to Cape: Tauranga school leavers to embark on epic adventure for charity https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/news/cape-to-cape-tauranga-school-leavers-to-embark-on-epic-adventure-for-charity/JTEHD4RLLFCAFJVABTKE4IKOMM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/news/cape-to-cape-tauranga-school-leavers-to-embark-on-epic-adventure-for-charity/JTEHD4RLLFCAFJVABTKE4IKOMM/ Kaitlyn MorrellAdventuring from the East to West Cape, three boys have turned an idea into reality. Thu, 14 Nov 2024 16:03:00 +0000 William Dunn, Olly Dow and Thomas Winter are gearing up for a three-week, 800km multisport journey from East Cape to Cape Egmont, aiming to raise $50,000 for the Child Cancer Foundation.
Clarks Beach Golf Club scandal: Couple caught apparently having sex on rural Auckland golf course https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/clarks-beach-golf-club-scandal- Couple-caught-apparently-having-sex-on-rural-auckland-golf-course/JBD66EIPNFFT5CTIT5FQ23LH3E/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/clarks-beach-golf-club-scandal- Couple-caught-apparently-having-sex-on-rural-auckland-golf-course/JBD66EIPNFFT5CTIT5FQ23LH3E/ The Clarks Beach club said it was aware of the lewd incident. Thu, 14 Nov 2024 16:00:00 +0000 The couple's encounter (inset) was snapped by a fellow golfer at the Clarks Beach Golf Club, who anonymously posted the image on a Facebook community page on Tuesday. Main photo / Google Maps

Gisborne’s most popular pet names revealed: Are your pets among the favourites? https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/gisbornes-most-popular-pet-names-revealed-luna-and-bella-among-most-popular/VAS7IFIR2ZBBZDJN65IFYJNKEY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/gisbornes-most-popular-pet-names-revealed-luna-and-bella-among-most-popular/VAS7IFIR2ZBBZDJN65IFYJNKEY/ James PocockResidents share why names like Bella or Luna were best for their furry friends. Thu, 14 Nov 2024 16:00:00 +0000 Luna is the most popular pet name of all time in Gisborne, according to NZ Companion Animal Register, while Bella was the most popular name of those registered in 2024.
